argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-fun | |- ( Fun F <-> ( Rel F /\ ( F o. `' F ) C_ _I ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_simprbi | |- ( Fun F -> ( F o. `' F ) C_ _I ) |
| 3 |  | #P_iss | |- ( ( F o. `' F ) C_ _I <-> ( F o. `' F ) = ( _I |` dom ( F o. `' F ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_dfdm4 | |- dom F = ran `' F |
| 5 |  | #P_dmcoeq | |- ( dom F = ran `' F -> dom ( F o. `' F ) = dom `' F ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom ( F o. `' F ) = dom `' F |
| 7 |  | #P_df-rn | |- ran F = dom `' F |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqtr4i | |- dom ( F o. `' F ) = ran F |
| 9 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( Fun F -> dom ( F o. `' F ) = ran F ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_reseq2d | |- ( Fun F -> ( _I |` dom ( F o. `' F ) ) = ( _I |` ran F ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( Fun F -> ( ( F o. `' F ) = ( _I |` dom ( F o. `' F ) ) <-> ( F o. `' F ) = ( _I |` ran F ) ) ) |
| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_syl5bb | |- ( Fun F -> ( ( F o. `' F ) C_ _I <-> ( F o. `' F ) = ( _I |` ran F ) ) ) |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_mpbid | |- ( Fun F -> ( F o. `' F ) = ( _I |` ran F ) ) |
